name: Stone Age Snap VR
description:
Photograph prehistoric creatures on a VR safari! Take a Virtual Reality tour through this prehistoric jungle. Don't get trampled by the Mammoth! Save your best shots of each creature! Keep your eye out for gators, sabertooth lynxes and more! Can you can find them all?

#STONEAGESNAP

Features:
* Ride a Glyptodon!
* Take pictures of the amazing animals and save them in your field journal!
* Beautifully modeled 3D environments!
* Look through all your saved pics!

To fully enjoy this app you'll need a Virtual Reality viewer such as a Google Cardboard or View-Master®.
Learn more and get your own Cardboard viewer at http://g.co/cardboard.
